item.title: A code error (508)
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

You’re not supposed to add any code after the last closing bracket of a class unless you’re defining another class.
Move that method above the bracket.

Read full topic

item.title: A code error (508)
item.dc:creator: @anelm anelm
item.description:
@anelm wrote:

Im trying to add this code to the end of npc.java,

[code]
private void npcAggression(int j) {
for (Player p3 : Engine.players) {
if (p3 != null && !p3.isDead) {
if (!p3.isDead && !Engine.npcs[j].isDead) {
if (Misc.getDistance(Engine.npcs[j].absX, Engine.npcs[j].absY, p3.absX, p3.absY) <= 1) {
Engine.npcs[j].attackPlayer = p3.playerId;
Engine.npcs[j].attackingPlayer = true;
p3.attackNPC = j;
p3.attackingNPC = true;
} else if (Misc.getDistance(Engine.npcs[j].absX, Engine.npcs[j].absY, p3.absX, p3.absY) >= 2 && Misc.getDistance(Engine.npcs[j].absX, Engine.npcs[j].absY, p3.absX, p3.absY) < 6) {
if (j != 2745) {
} else if (Misc.getDistance(Engine.npcs[j].absX, Engine.npcs[j].absY, p3.absX, p3.absY) >= 6) {
Engine.npcs[j].attackingPlayer = false;
break;
}
}
}
}
}
}

private void checkNPC() {
switch (npcType) {
case 2745:
npcAggression(npcId);
break;
default:
return;
}
}
}[/code]

I added the code all the way on the bottom after the last “}”. But i keep getting these errors… i have tried everything if someone can help it would be appreciated.

.\Bulby\npcs\NPC.java:438: class, interface, or enum expected private void npcAggression(int j) { ^ .\Bulby\npcs\NPC.java:444: class, interface, or enum expected Engine.npcs[j].attackingPlayer = true; ^ .\Bulby\npcs\NPC.java:445: class, interface, or enum expected p3.attackNPC = j; ^ .\Bulby\npcs\NPC.java:446: class, interface, or enum expected p3.attackingNPC = true; ^ .\Bulby\npcs\NPC.java:447: class, interface, or enum expected } else if (Misc.getDistance(Engine.npcs[j].absX, Engine.npcs [j].absY, p3.absX, p3.absY) >= 2 && Misc.getDistance(Engine.npcs[j].absX, Engine .npcs[j].absY, p3.absX, p3.absY) < 6) { ^ .\Bulby\npcs\NPC.java:451: class, interface, or enum expected break; ^ .\Bulby\npcs\NPC.java:452: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ .\Bulby\npcs\NPC.java:457: class, interface, or enum expected break; ^ .\Bulby\npcs\NPC.java:458: class, interface, or enum expected default: ^ .\Bulby\npcs\NPC.java:460: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ 10 errors Press any key to continue . . .
